channel.title: Mastermind (Minnor Changes)
channel.description:
**Changes** Will now show up as unseen to the sheriff/Observer on the first three nights. (Remove In the shadows)
Day ability Disappear, Hide from investigative classes the following night appearing as Not Suspicious (3 uses)
Starting Assasssin and the First convert will become the new Mastermind if they die, If the OG Mastermind used "Disappear" the number of uses will be shared.
-Buffs unseen a faction that is currently slightly worse then cult, giving it edge over being screwed over from a Masterminds early death, also requiring the Mastermind to hide from sheriffs now lets it choose when it wants to appear NS.
of course if you think there should be changes or this is a bad idea I want you to leave feedback.
